Featured-image: CK23-black-halter-top-evening-dress-with-open-back_p.jpg

Description: A sequined halter top is beaded elegantly and has a high collar. The flirtatious back is open with a triangle pattern and the straps are beaded with a center belted piece. The form fitting skirt flows to the floor and adds to the chic style.
